name: Cho'Gath
title: the Terror of the Void
lore: From the moment Cho'Gath first emerged into the harsh light of Runeterra's sun, the beast was driven by the most pure and insatiable hunger. A perfect expression of the Void's desire to consume all life, Cho'Gath's complex biology quickly converts matter into new bodily growthâ€”increasing its muscle mass and density, or hardening its outer carapace like organic diamond. When growing larger does not suit the Void-spawn's needs, it vomits out the excess material as razor-sharp spines, leaving prey skewered and ready to feast upon later.
blurb: From the moment Cho'Gath first emerged into the harsh light of Runeterra's sun, the beast was driven by the most pure and insatiable hunger. A perfect expression of the Void's desire to consume all life, Cho'Gath's complex biology quickly converts...
allytips: Try to line up your attacks with Vorpal Spikes so that they kill minions and harass enemy champions at the same time.
If you're having difficulty feasting upon champions, try eating minions until you're larger.
Using Rupture on creeps in combination with Carnivore is a good way to gain Health and Mana.
enemytips: Purchasing a few HP items decreases the chances of Cho'Gath killing you quickly.
Focus on preventing Cho'Gath from reaching his max size.
Rupture has a smoke cloud indicating the area it will strike. Try to watch out for it to prevent Cho'Gath from being able to combo his abilities.

riot_spell_q.name: Rupture
riot_spell_q.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
riot_spell_q.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for {{ e5 }} second, take {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage, and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

riot_spell_w.name: Feral Scream
riot_spell_w.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Silences enemies in a cone for {{ e2 }} seconds and deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage.

riot_spell_e.name: Vorpal Spikes
riot_spell_e.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f1 }}% of enemies' maximum Health as magic damage and slow by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, decaying over the duration.

Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.
Spikes deal an additional 0.5% of enemies' maximum Health per Feast stack.
Percent Health damage against minions and monsters is capped at {{ e8 }}.

riot_spell_r.name: Feast
riot_spell_r.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Ravenously feed on an enemy, dealing {{ rdamage }} true damage to champions or {{ rmonsterdamage }} to minions and monsters. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain {{ rhealthperstack }} maximum health.

Only {{ rminionmaxstacks }} total stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic monsters. (Current: {{ f3 }}/{{ rminionmaxstacks }})

riot_spell_i.name: Carnivore
riot_spell_i.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Carnivore
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever '''Cho'Gath''' kills an enemy or destroys an enemy structure, he restores {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|20 to 71}} health}}}} and {{as|{{sti|mana|{{pp|3.5 to 7.75}} mana}}}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Rupture
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Cho'Gath''' causes the target area to rupture after a {{fd|0.625}} seconds delay, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} enemies hit for 1 second, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 60% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds afterwards and dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* The animation is visible in brush and in [[Sight|fog of war]].
* ''Rupture'' grants {{tip|sight}} while its visual effect plays.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Feral Scream
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Cho'Gath''' roars in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in a cone and {{tip|silence|silencing}} them for a short duration.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Vorpal Spikes
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Cho'Gath's''' next 3 [[basic attack]]s within 6 seconds have {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and launch a volley of spikes in a line, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and applying a decaying {{tip|slow}} over the next {{fd|1.5}} seconds to enemies hit.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|22 to 70}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|(+ 3% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5%}} per {{ai|Feast|Cho'Gath}} stack)|buzzword}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|22*3 to 70*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}} {{as|(+ 9% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5%}} per {{ai|Feast|Cho'Gath}} stack)|buzzword}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}{{st|Slow|{{ap|30 to 50}}%}}
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Vorpal Spikes'' has no cast time and does not interrupt Cho'Gath's previous orders.
* {{ii|Rylai's Crystal Scepter}} and {{iis|Liandry's Torment}} passives apply to every target hit by the spikes.
* Cho'Gath's size factors into how wide of a hitbox ''Vorpal Spikes'' has. External site modifiers ({{ai|Wild Growth|Lulu}}) contribute.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Feast
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Cho'Gath''' attempts to eat the target enemy, dealing {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}}. Against non-[[champion]]s the base damage is increased to 1000.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: If ''Feast'' kills its target '''Cho'Gath''' gains one ''Feast'' stack. Only 6 stacks can be gained from non-epic monsters or minions.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: Each stack grants him {{as|{{sti|health|'''bonus''' health}}}}, which can stack up to 255 times, as well as {{sti|range|'''bonus''' attack range}} and increased size that stack up to {{pp|type=Rank|3|17|13|10|1|2|3}} times, for a maximum {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' attack range}}.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling3: {{st|Bonus Health Per Stack|{{as|{{ap|80|120|160}} '''bonus''' health}}}}{{st|Bonus Attack Range Per Stack|{{ap|4.5|6|7.5}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* {{cai|Dragon Force|Mordekaiser}} and {{iis|Zz'Rot Portal}} {{ui|Voidspawn|Voidspawns|nolink=true}} do not count toward the 6 stack limit.
* The order in which '''Cho'Gath''' acquires the two types of stacks is irrelevant (e.g. 6 champions and 6 minions, for a total of 12 stacks in any order).
* The health and attack range granted by active ''Feast'' stacks will increase as '''Cho'Gath''' ranks up the ability.
* If an enemy's health is low enough that they will die from ''Feast'' a glowing red ring appears underneath them.
* Nineteen stacks of max rank ''Feast'' with no other HP items (3040 bonus hp) is the point when {{ii|Cinderhulk}} will give more health than {{ii|Warmog's Armor}} or any other item.
* Each stack of ''Feast'' increases its active damage by {{ap|8|12|16}}.
